actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend bond authority for those empowerment and enterprise zones with unused bond limitation at the end of 2011.
subjects: Urban and suburban affairs and development

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2012 the authority for issuance of bonds in empowerment and enterprise zones with unused bond limitations.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend bond authority for those empowerment and enterprise zones with unused bond limitation at the end of 2011.
